modShortDescription: Respawns vehicles in the game. Down grades vehicles to one of the wheels with rim laying on ground so that you can tell it is not a normal tire to chop.
modDescription:
Respawns vehicles in the game. Down grades vehicles to one of the wheels with rim laying on ground so that you can tell it is not a normal tire to chop. Anabella also used metal material so that it takes a few more hits to destroy it. Destroying will stop the vehicle [respawning](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-respawn/) for anyone wanting to build where the vehicles are or clear the road.

**[Download](https://github.com/Anabella00geek/7D2D-Vehicle-Respawner-A20/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25821-a20-anas-vehicle-respawning/).

**Credits:** Anabella
